Note

This launcher is able to take advantage of Bootstrap's JavaScript components. This allows you (the developer) to take advantage of widgetized launch screens rather than coding everything from a blank slate. Click the demo container below to expand its properties to see this feature in action, or click the button below to read the online documentation.
